name: On The Grid Off The Grid
name_original: On The Grid Off The Grid
description:
Made for A Game By Its Cover 2017 Jam

Based on this design: http://famicase.com/17/softs/165.html

by Niko Lanzuisi & Natalia Davydova

Instructions:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Mouse Wheel to zoom in / out

Space to interact

Esc to quit

There is now a post jam version with some bug fixes and I've also added instructions.
